name: Blazblue-divekick
tagline: Divekick-themed custom game mode for Blazblue Chronophantasma PC
body:
# How to use

1. Buy Blazblue Chronophantasma Extend on Steam

We support Arc System Works and everything they do. 
Even though Central Fiction is out on console, please support them by using a genuine copy of the game to try out **blazblue-divekick**

2. Install prerequisites

This app depends on **node.js** being installed and availible in the system **PATH**. Any version should do.

3. Download and extract the zip to a folder.

4. Inside the folder, run the batch file **setup.bat**. This only needs to be done once.

5. Start Blazblue Chronophantasma Extend

6. Run **run.bat**

7. Select any of the **blazblue-divekick** characters and have fun!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
